name: ext_R5_ValueSet_co_in_co_designation
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.ValueSet.compose.include.concept.designation for use in FHIR R2
description: This cross-version extension represents ValueSet.compose.include.concept.designation from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ValueSet|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R2.

element.definition: Additional representations for this concept when used in this value set - other languages, aliases, specialized purposes, used for particular purposes, etc.
element.comment: `ValueSet.compose.include.concept.designation` maps to R2 `ValueSet.compose.include.concept.designation`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
